description: Split the MS, combine/separate/regrid spws and do channel and time averaging

parameters.info: Name of input visibility file
parameters.name: msname

parameters.info: Name of output measurement set
parameters.name: output-msname

parameters.info: Create a multi-MS output from an input MS
parameters.name: createmms

parameters.info: Axis to do parallelization across.
parameters.name: separationaxis

parameters.info: The number of Sub-MSs to create (auto or any number)
parameters.name: numsubms

parameters.info: ist with 1 or 3 elements giving the tile shape of the disk data columns
parameters.name: tileshape

parameters.info: Which data column(s) to split out
parameters.name: datacolumn

parameters.info: Make a real virtual MODEL column
parameters.name: realmodelcol

parameters.info: Keep *completely flagged rows* or drop them from the output
parameters.name: keepflags

parameters.info: Create a WEIGHT_SPECTRUM column in the output MS
parameters.name: usewtspectrum

parameters.info: Combine the input spws into a new output spw
parameters.name: combinespws

parameters.info: Average data in channels
parameters.name: chanaverage

parameters.info: Width (bin) of input channels to average to form an output channel
parameters.name: chanbin

parameters.info: Hannig smooth data to remove Gibbs ringing
parameters.name: hanning

parameters.info: Transform channel labels and visibilities to a different spectral reference frame. Notice that u,v,w data is not transformed.
parameters.name: regridms

parameters.info: Regridding mode (channel/velocity/frequency/channel_b)
parameters.name: mode

parameters.info: Number of channels in the output spw (-1=all)
parameters.name: nchan

parameters.info: First channel to use in the output spw (mode-dependant)
parameters.name: start

parameters.info: Number of input channels that are used to create an output channel.
parameters.name: width

parameters.info: Number of output spws to create in output MS.
parameters.name: nspw

parameters.info: Spectral interpolation method
parameters.name: interpolation

parameters.info: Phase center direction to be used for the spectral coordinate transformation: position or field index
parameters.name: phasecenter

parameters.info: Rest frequency to use for output
parameters.name: restfreq

parameters.info: Output reference frame (''=keep input frame).
parameters.name: outframe

parameters.info: Velocity definition
parameters.name: veltype

parameters.info: Average data in time
parameters.name: timeaverage

parameters.info: Bin width for time averaging
parameters.name: timebin

parameters.info: Span the timebin across scan, state or both
parameters.name: timespan

parameters.info: Maximum separation of start-to-end baselines that can be included in an average. (meters)
parameters.name: maxuvwdistance

parameters.info: Enable on-the-fly (OTF) calibration as in task applycal
parameters.name: docallib

parameters.info: Path to calibration library file
parameters.name: callib

parameters.info: Enable continuum subtraction as in task uvcontsub
parameters.name: douvcontsub

parameters.info: Spectral window:channel selection for fitting the continuum
parameters.name: fitspw

parameters.info: Polynomial order for the fits
parameters.name: fitorder

parameters.info: Produce continuum estimate instead of continuum subtracted data
parameters.name: want_cont

parameters.info: Select field using ID(s) or name(s). Comma separated string
parameters.name: field

parameters.info: Select spectral window/channels
parameters.name: spw

parameters.info: Select data by scan numbers
parameters.name: scan

parameters.info: Select data by time range
parameters.name: timerange

parameters.info: Select data by scan numbers
parameters.name: scan

parameters.info: Select by observation ID(s)
parameters.name: observation

parameters.info: Select data by scan intents
parameters.name: intent

parameters.info: Select (sub)array(s) by array ID number
parameters.name: array

parameters.info: Select data by baseline length
parameters.name: uvrange

parameters.info: Select data by baseline length
parameters.name: correlation

parameters.info: If practical, keep *completely flagged rows* instead of dropping them.
parameters.name: keepflags
